gnat.filter.ner
Class SpeciesRecognitionFilter

java.lang.Object
  gnat.filter.ner.SpeciesRecognitionFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class SpeciesRecognitionFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

A filter that scans texts for species and assigns NCBI Taxonomy IDs.

IDs will be stored in each text's Text.taxonIDs field and thus not be annotated with positions.

Author:
Jörg Hakenberg <jhakenberg@users.sourceforge.net>
